name: Twist Healing
prereq: Ability To Cast Heal And Harm
summary: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims.
description:
Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims. Whenever you Activate an Item to cast a heal spell, you can invert its energy to produce the effects of an equivalent harm spell instead.Traits

Dhampir: A creature with this trait has the dhampir versatile heritage. These humanoids are the mortal offspring of vampires and members of other ancestries.
